law.catch_line: Priority of construction subdistrict assessment liens -- Enforcement.

text.section: Assessment liens imposed by KRS 220.553 to 220.613 are prior to all other liens except liens for taxes and other assessment liens already attached.
Assessment liens may be enforced pursuant to KRS 426.005 and 426.006.

law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 78, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 12.
